detail_desc: Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a lace-trimmed V-neck with lacing at the top. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Airy blouse in a crinkled weave with lace details. V-neck with lacing, long, straight sleeves with lace-trimmed cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist and concealed zip and button at one side. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and long, cuffed sleeves. Seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Tights with an elasticated waist and side stripes. 30 denier.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and gathered elastication up from the hem at the back.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a patterned viscose weave with long sleeves with ties at the ends. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Strapless bikini top with removable inserts. No fasteners.
Short skirt in imitation suede with a high waist, buttons at the top and a laser-cut, scalloped hem. Lined.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Vest top in cotton jersey.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and decorative rings at the sides.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the sides and crotch.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.
Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with long puff sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and a bell-shaped, tiered skirt. Unlined.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidery detail on the chest and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a V-neck, decorative knot detail at the front and long sleeves.
Fine-knit ankle socks with elastication at the top.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed, boxy fit with dropped shoulders.
Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with pleats at the top and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Double-layered front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Tailored trousers in a sturdy textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can be tied in various ways and worn as a sarong around the hips, a beach dress, a wrapover top or a turban. Size 130x150 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace blouse with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shaping bikers in microfibre. High waist with a laser-cut edge and short legs with lace-trimmed hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a gathered, elasticated neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist. Jersey lining.
Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in satin with piped trims. Shirt with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Long, double-breasted coat in a woven wool blend with notch lapels. Side pockets with a fake flap, an inner pocket, a tie belt and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes. a decorative bow at the front and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 8 cm.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with full feet and wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Thin metal hoop earrings with pendants in various designs. Length approx. 3.5 cm.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim and a small stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Moccasins in suede with a decorative seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber half-soles.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, airy viscose twill with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch front pockets and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Shorts in soft, gently draping silk with covered elastication and ties at the waist, side pockets and short slits in the sides.
Top in soft fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Soft toy made of soft velour with polyester padding dressed in a removable tulle dress with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Length approx. 26 cm.
Set with a hat, scarf and gloves in a soft fine knit. Double-layered hat with a small appliqué on the turned-up hem. Gloves with ribbed cuffs.
Joggers in cotton twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Swimsuit with a frill around the neckline and down the shoulder straps at the back. Lined front.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Rib-knit hat containing some wool with a faux fur pompom on the top.
Wide V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit shaftless socks with a silicone trim around the heel to hold them in place.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and a placket with press-studs.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up hem with a small fabric appliqué.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned jacquard weave containing glittery threads. Gathered seam at the waist for added width, a concealed zip at the back and a tulle underskirt. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a unique nursing feature, turtleneck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.
Boots in soft imitation suede with a fold-down shaft that has a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in jersey with a small stand-up collar that has gathers at the front and an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist with pleats at the front for added width, a tie belt and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch and a print motif on the front. Leggings with foldover ribbing at the waist.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Jumper in a soft pattern knit containing some alpaca wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in soft, washed denim. High paper bag waist with a detachable belt, zip fly and two buttons. Unlined.
Metal and acetate earrings in various designs. Length from 3.5 cm to 5 cm.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, gathered yoke at the back, and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, a chest pocket with a button, concealed pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in a fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the top, short sleeves and a gentle flare to the hem.
